document.full_text: the supreme court on monday rejected a challenge to a california law that gives illegal immigrants the same in-state college tuition rates as legal state residents, another contentious issue in the nation's immigration policy debate.
document.title: supreme court rejects illegal immigrants' tuition case
lines_and_colors: the supreme court on monday rejected a challenge to a california law that gives illegal immigrants the same in-state college tuition rates as legal state residents, another contentious issue in the nation's immigration policy debate.
